sentence.Network_en: The sulfide assemlage consists largely of pyrrhotite, pentlandite, chalcopyrite, and pyrite.
sentence.Network_cn: 硫化物集体大部由磁黄铁矿 、 镍黄铁矿 、 黄铜矿及黄铁矿组成.

sentence.Network_en: Associated minerals are mainly magnetite and ilmenite, subordinately pyrite and rarely chalcopyrite.
sentence.Network_cn: 主要伴生矿物为磁铁矿、钛铁矿, 少量黄铁矿和微量黄铜矿.

sentence.Network_en: While chalcopyrite adsorbs gold most weakly with its adsorption capacity 9 % only.
sentence.Network_cn: 吸附性相对最弱的是黄铜矿,吸附量仅为9%.

because of chalcopyrite and pyrite have different electron numbers in their molecular d-orbits , collector " CSU-A " has selectivity for them .同时由于捕收剂CSU-A的非极性基的空间位阻效应增强，对黄铜矿、黄铁矿的选择性作用增强。

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 19th cent.: from modern Latin chalcopyrites, from Greek khalkos 'copper' + puritēs (see pyrites)

means.word_mean: 1. a yellow copper ore (CuFeS2) made up of copper-iron sulfide
